step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder blades are moving well, but try to bring them down a bit more as you roll them back. Keep up the good work!
Great job on the circular motion! Focus on keeping your elbows closer to your body as you roll your shoulders. This helps isolate the shoulder movement.
You're completing the rolls nicely. For the next reps, try to keep your wrists relaxed and avoid letting them lead the movement. Focus on the shoulder action.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with your shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to keep your elbows closer to your body and wrists relaxed for even better results.
